description:
Smart. Focused. Email.

Fast, cross-platform email designed to filter out the noise - so you can focus on what's important.
This update brings stability improvements and bug fixes:
- Fixed an issue preventing logins for non-Gmail accounts. Spark incorrectly displayed the Gmail login page instead of the correct login pages for other providers.
- Fixed an issue causing the Calendar tab to close unexpectedly in certain scenarios, redirecting users to the Inbox.
- Improved template sorting in search resultsâ€”teams with matching templates now appear first, making it easier to find the right one.
This release also includes UI adjustments, refinements for right-to-left (RTL) text display, style enhancements, and general performance optimizations.

For any questions or issues, feel free to contact us at support@sparkmailapp.com.
